English: You have received {0} Booster(s) to improve your chances of survival. Use them wisely. Find and retrieve artifacts to be rewarded with additional Boosters.
Description: A text that informs the player that the artifacts they collected during the last expedition/mission have been traded in for one or more boosters. This text is a little more descriptive and only used the very first time this happens. The way the text combines the singular and plural version of "booster" with a parentheses around the "s" is intentional, to make Warden come across as rigid and machine-like. The "{0}" represents the number of boosters - do not alter that piece of code, just put it in the gramatically correct position in the sentence.

French.Translation: Vous avez reçu {0} booster(s) pour améliorer vos chances de survie. Utilisez-les à bon escient. Trouvez et récupérez des artefacts pour recevoir des boosters supplémentaires.

Italian.Translation: Hai ricevuto {0} potenziamento/i per aumentare le tue probabilità di sopravvivenza. Fanne buon uso. Trova e recupera manufatti per ottenere come ricompensa potenziamenti aggiuntivi.

German.Translation: Sie haben {0} Booster erhalten, um Ihre Überlebenschancen zu erhöhen. Setzen Sie sie weise ein. Finden und sammeln Sie Artefakte, um mit zusätzlichen Boostern belohnt zu werden.

Spanish.Translation: Has recibido {0} potenciador(es) para mejorar tu probabilidad de supervivencia. Piensa bien cómo utilizarlos. Busca y recupera artefactos para recibir potenciadores adicionales.

Russian.Translation: Чтобы повысить шанс выживания, вы получаете усилители: {0}. Используйте их с умом. Собирайте артефакты и получайте дополнительные усилители.

Portuguese_Brazil.Translation: Você recebeu {0} impulso(s) para aumentar suas chances de sobrevivência. Use-os bem. Encontre e recupere artefatos para receber mais impulsos.

Polish.Translation: Otrzymujesz {0} wzmacniacze(-y), aby zwiększyć swoje szanse przetrwania. Wykorzystaj je mądrze. Znajdź i zbierz artefakty, aby otrzymać w nagrodę dodatkowe wzmacniacze.

Japanese.Translation: 生存率を高めるブースターを {0} 個受け取った。賢く使おう。アーティファクトを見つけて回収し、追加ブースターを手に入れろ。

Korean.Translation: 생존 확률을 높일 수 있는 부스터를 {0}개 받았습니다. 현명하게 사용하세요. 아티팩트를 찾아 회수하고 추가 부스터를 받으세요.

Chinese_Traditional.Translation: 你收到了{0}份強化劑，可用來提高生存機會。請謹慎使用。尋找並取回寶物，即可獲得更多強化劑。

Chinese_Simplified.Translation: 你已获得{0}份强化剂以提高生存几率。请合理使用。寻找并收回红晶以换取更多强化剂。

name: MainMenu.Lobby.BoosterRewardFirstTime_X
